BUGMAX.Notes: Maximum value of bug to be used as reference to build the scale function of the altitude control (extracted from the path-planning trajectory)

GHVMAX.Notes: Maximum value of ghv to be used as reference to build the scale function of the down-range control  (extracted from the path-planning

Obs Ds.Notes: Observer time constant of the down-range

Obs Dv.Notes: Observer time constant of the velocity

Obs Dh.Notes: Observer time constant of the altitude

Obs Dfpa.Notes: Observer time constant of the FPA

State FeedBack H.Notes: State feedback time constant of the altitude closed loop

State FeedBack S.Notes: First state feedback time constant of the down-range closed loop
Second state feedback time constant of the down-range closed loop
